name: Planet explosion simulator
description: The super-real sci-fi simulation game, whether it is visual effects or auditory experience, makes people feel comfortable. Simulate the big bang of the planet, start the challenge from the galaxy to choose your favorite planet, let this planet fall! Free choice of gameplay, destroy the universe planets, the explosion sound is very cool.Features:1. Exquisite and beautiful realistic art pictures give you a different visual experience.2. A variety of planets are waiting for you to destroy, and many weapons can be used flexibly to satisfy your desire to collect.3. Simple and interesting gameplay, all players can easily enjoy the fun of the game.4. Complete and diversified ranking system, allowing you to compete with players all over the world.
